00017 void str_toupper( char string[] )
00018 {
00019     int i;
00020     int str_length = (int) strlen(string);
00021 
00022     for ( i = 0; i < str_length; i++ ) {
00023         string[i] = toupper( string[i] );
00024     }
00025 
00026     return;
00027 }

00042 void my_strcpy( char destination[], char source[], int destination_length )
00043 {
00044     if ( (int) strlen(source) <= destination_length ) {
00045         strcpy( destination, source );
00046     }
00047     else {
00048         fprintf( stderr, "Cannot copy destination string into source string\n");
00049         exit(1);
00050     }
00051 
00052     return;
00053 }
